Subject: J2EEUnit 0.4 now supports Servlet 2.1 and JDK 1.1

J2EEUnit 0.4 now support both Servlet API 2.1 and 2.2. All the Ant 
build files have also been modified to support 
compilation/javadoc/testing/... with JDK 1.1

It is available at http://sourceforge.net/projects/j2eeunit/

Release notes are available at 
http://sourceforge.net/project/shownotes.php?
group_id=14156&release_id=16369

Thanks.
Vincent.
subject: J2EEUnit 0.4 now supports Servlet 2.1 and JDK 1.1
